title: 4.3 Master Challenge 2
question: Pick two libraries in your preferred programming language that serve the same purpose (for instance, in the Math library and external mathjs library). Create a simple application using both libraries separately, and write a comparison of your experiences. Discuss the strengths and weaknesses of each library and in what situations one might be preferable over the other.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
